short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hiresome AI extension helps recruiters sync profiles across the web with their Hiresome Account
short.ko: React, Typescript, Vite를 사용한 크롬 익스텐션 보일러플레이트입니다.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hiresome AI extension helps recruiters sync profiles across the web with their Hiresome Account
- Process Linkedin profiles and add the directly to your Hiresome Candidate Pool.
- Upload and parse resume directly from the popup menu.
